profileAlternative.name: Abhishek Dubey
profileAlternative.headline: Technical Lead (Sr. Python Dev) at HCL Technologies
profileAlternative.summary:
Experienced Automation Lead and Python Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in PYTHON 2/3, Development of in-house AUTOMATION frameworks as well as LEADing automation projects.

Looking for challenging roles as a Senior Python Developer and/or Lead Automation Engineer in Canada

aboutAlternative.text:
Experienced Automation Lead and Python Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in PYTHON 2/3, Development of in-house AUTOMATION frameworks as well as LEADing automation projects.

Looking for challenging roles as a Senior Python Developer and/or Lead Automation Engineer in Canada

positions.title: Technical Lead (Python Developer)
positions.description:
Lead Python Developer
- Leading a team of 4-5 developers to deliver a robust and efficient, Python based Automation framework for VMWare's DEVOPS process
- Automating the end-to-end DEVOPS process focusing on eliminating manual intervention and optimizing executions to minimize execution time
- Involved with full stack Python development including core Python development with OOPS for backend development, Python with MYSQL for middle ware development and Python with Django for frontend portal/dashboard development

Automation Lead
- Heading the Automation team for HCL for client facing Automation project (VMWare)
- Responsible for Project management tasks for the team (4-5 Python developers)
- Responsible for working closely with the Client for task delegation and automation framework designing and improvement


…
see more

positions.title: Automation Engineer (Tech lead - Python Developer)
positions.description:
QA Engineer:
- Technical lead for validating FPGA/networking prodcuts
- Providing support to developers and facilitating Agile product development
- Validating and delivering time-sensitive, analytical test solutions
- First line of defense and gatekeeper role for any production issues

Automation Dev:
- Responsible for kickstarting the Automation Dev project for the team as Project Manager, Automation Developer and Design Architect
- Developing a robust, efficient and sleek Automation framework; managing two software developers under me

Experience with: Technical project management, Automation architecture designing, PYTHON, Tcl/Tk, FPGA product validation, Linux, Ansible, RF Products

Additional Experience with: IXIA/Ostinato/Scapy, Ansible, JIRA, Confluence, SQL


…
see more

positions.title: Software Developer/Tester (Python)
positions.description:
Extensive experience with: Python, FreeBSD, HTML, XML, MySQL, Jenkins, Networking Protocols (TCP/IP), Networking/WAN/Satellite products

Additional experience with: Windows Server, JIRA, Confluence, IXIA

positions.title: Software Automation Developer (Python)
positions.description:
Automation Developer: worked with indigenous Automation framework for pre-released Blackberry devices, with focus on Networking, Multimedia aspects.

Extensive experience with: Python, QNX, Unix, JIRA, Confluence, MKS Integrity, Telecom products

positions.title: Embedded Systems Software Tester
positions.description:
Software test automation for pre-release Blackberry devices

Extensive experience with: Python, QNX, Unix, JIRA, Confluence

positions.title: Systems Administrator Jr.
positions.description: Providing support to Glentel's retail stores and business centers, testing and troubleshooting hardware issues, asset tracking and manegement

given.text:
Abhishek was a pleasure to work with as the project was a very demanding from the customer. There were lot of changes incorporated at the eleventh hour and on time delivery was the key focus with zero defects. He has a nice attitude and made sure that he is always on top of work never letting anything slip. He made sure that the releases we had were seamless and achieved a unique distinction of being the go to guy in no time. The trait of true team player doubled with confidence was the key to his success. I will love to work with him again and wish him all success
…
See more

Abhishek was hired as a coop for a 4 month term, and that quickly changed to 8 months, once we met and got to see his work ethic. Though, I did not work at RIM during his entire work term, I did see strong technical skills, commitment, friendliness and a team player attitude. At times, when deadlines were tight, he also willfully worked overtime to assist workloads for other teammates in crunch time. It was a pleasure working with Abhishek and I would not hesitate to work with him again, in any regard.
…
See more

Abhishek Dubey is a talented and hardworking professional. He has excellent leadership skills, interpersonal skills and management potential. His team and mine team collaborated on some projects that were time sensitive. Abhishek was calm under pressure, worked well directing and training people who were new to the task, and shared his technical expertise to team members without a technical/engineering background in an understandable, informative way. I recommend him for any career opportunities that requires management skills, leadership potential, and team work abilities.
…
See more

received.text:
Ratheesh is easily one of the best managers I have had the pleasure of reporting to during my career. 
He is extremely approachable and goes above and beyond to provide a comfortable working environment even with the toughest of clients. Ratheesh not only ensured that the team had enough motivation to deliver timely and quality results, but also encouraged us to grow in our respective careers. This in turn was a boost to do a good job so as to not let him down. He has infectious energy and holds your attention individually even when addressing a big group. 

It was an absolute privilege working under Ratheesh and I am absolutely certain that any team that he manages will have gained a wonderful manager
